note.p: Career: Taught at Winchester College (1914); Fellow of Trinity College, Cambridge; University Lecturer in Mathematics; John Humphrey Plummer Professor of Mathematical Physics, Cambridge (1931-1944); member of Governing Body, Winchester College (1933-1944)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1945-1948 vol 5 pp 61-78, plate, by E A Milne
References: R V Jones, 'Addendum' in NR 1994 vol 48 p 165
Sir William McCrea, 'Sir Ralph Howard Fowler, 1889-1944: a Centenary Lecture' in NR 1993 vol 47 pp 61-78, plate
Sir William McCrea, review of S Chandrasekhar, Selected Papers. Vol. 1: Stellar Structure and Stellar Atmospheres. Vol. 2: Radiative Transfer and Negative Ion of Hydrogen in NR 1990 vol 44 pp 137-139
Meg Weston Smith, 'E A Milne and the Creation of Air Defence: Some Letters From an Unprincipled Brigand, 1916-1919' in NR 1990 vol 44 pp 241-255
